name: bitsy-savior
description: bitsy editor by Adam Le Doux put in a desktop app. can update game data in exported html files on your disk. super useful when you work with bitsy-hacks

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-mac && npm run build-linux && npm run build-windows && echo "build successful"
scripts.push_win: butler push ./build/bitsy-savior-win32-x64/ aloelazoe/bitsy-savior:windows-64 && butler push ./build/bitsy-savior-win32-ia32/ aloelazoe/bitsy-savior:windows-32
scripts.push: npm run push_mac && npm run push_linux && npm run push_win && butler status aloelazoe/bitsy-savior
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run push

author: Elkie Nova
